title: "Bills"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  message: false
---


```{r}
library(gt)

# read the first sheet of your Excel file
bills <- read.csv("files/csvs/bill_list.csv")

bills$PDF <- paste0("[View Bill](files/pdfs/bills/bill_", bills$bill_number, ".pdf)")

bills$Page <- paste0("[Page](bills-pages/bill_", bills$bill_number, ".html)")

# simple nice table with kableExtra
bills %>%
  gt() %>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = c("PDF", "Page")) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Bills",
    subtitle = "Click a link to open the corresponding PDF"
  )
```
